channel.title: Hot, Cold, or Iced Tea? Sweetened or Unsweetened?
channel.description:
For me, It's Sweet Tea, Iced.
How do YOU like your Tea?

item.title: Hot, Cold, or Iced Tea? Sweetened or Unsweetened?
item.dc:creator: eyvn
item.description:
What kind of tea I like cannot be summed up by simply saying hot, cold, sweetened or unsweetened. There is a host of variety out there just waiting to be sampled. Cold or iced is very good with lemon and a bit of sweetener but even that flavour can be adjusted by what sweetener you use: sugar, honey, stevia…

Whether or not to sweeten the hot and with what depends on different things. Green tea is best unsweetened, black tea is good with milk and sugar but lemon instead of milk makes a nice change. Earl Grey tea with milk and sugar and vanilla is even better. And then there are the spiced and herbal teas - but I won’t open that box.

Read full topic
item.source: Hot, Cold, or Iced Tea? Sweetened or Unsweetened?

item.title: Hot, Cold, or Iced Tea? Sweetened or Unsweetened?
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
xalener:

Can’t drink it anymore without my brain inserting the ol’ blood flavor in there.

What a fucking luxury-- it’s been at least a year since I’ve gotten to taste the sweet copper savoriness of unbroiled blood.

Do you know what I’m eating right now? A can of sliced beets.

Read full topic

item.title: Hot, Cold, or Iced Tea? Sweetened or Unsweetened?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
XenoSpyro:

This sums up my feelings.

Had teeth drilled, bleeding profusely while drinking that tea. Can’t drink it anymore without my brain inserting the ol’ blood flavor in there.

Personally, all Tea is good. Sweet, unsweet, hot, cold, wtf ever.
